hook.text: A farmer before harvest is anxious about money. After harvest, same farmer, sharper thinking.

buildup.text: Mullainathan tested sugarcane farmers in India before and after their harvest payments.

discovery.text: When cash was low, farmers scored significantly worse on cognitive tests.

twist.text: Nothing changed â€” not education, not IQ, not personality. Only their bank balance shifted.

climax.text: Financial worry takes up mental space that could be used for planning and self-control.

punchline.text: Worrying about money costs you brainpower.

quiz.question: What happened to farmers' cognitive performance before harvest?
options: It dropped due to financial stress
